info.title: Gupy Public API
info.description:
You may use __fields=all__ to retrieve all fields,
                      but be aware that new fields might be included without further notice.

get.description: Returns a list of candidate applications.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Application ID, queries passing this parameter will have higher request limit

parameters.name: currentStep.name
parameters.description: Current step name of the candidate application in the job (eg. Cadastro)

parameters.name: vacancyCode.code
parameters.description: Vacancy code associated to the candidate (after hiring)

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sorting order. The following fields are available: id, score, createdAt

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,candidate.name or fields=all)\
Default: id, score, createdAt, updatedAt, endedAt, tags, partnerName,
job.id, job.name, currentStep.id, currentStep.name, candidate.id,
candidate.name, candidate.lastName, candidate.email, candidate.birthdate,
candidate.identificationDocument,
candidate.linkedinProfileUrl, candidate.gender, candidate.mobileNumber,
candidate.phoneNumber, manualCandidate.id, manualCandidate.name,
manualCandidate.lastName, manualCandidate.email,
manualCandidate.mobileNumber, manualCandidate.linkedinProfileUrl,
manualCandidate.insertionSource, candidate.academicQualification.id,
candidate.academicQualification.formation,
candidate.academicQualification.institution,
candidate.academicQualification.course,
candidate.academicQualification.status,
candidate.academicQualification.startMonth,
candidate.academicQualification.startYear,
candidate.academicQualification.endMonth,
candidate.academicQualification.endYear

200.description: An array of candidates

post.description: Creates a new application, given the job and the candidate. You can create the application using the candidate id (when the candidate is already assigned for another job) or making a manual insertion of the candidate (when there is no information about the candidate yet).

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the application

patch.description: Moves an application to another step of the job.

200.description: A confirmation of successful move of the application

post.description: After you create an application, you might want to send an invite to an application.

201.description: A confirmation of successfully creation of the invite

put.description: Creates a tag on a candidate application at a specific job.

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the tag

delete.summary: Deleting an application tag by tag value
delete.description: Deletes an application tag using tag value.

200.description: A confirmation of successful deletion of the tag

get.description: Returns a list of application tags.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of application tags

204.description: A confirmation of successfully update of hiring information

get.description: Returns application hiring information.

200.description: Hiring information

get.description: Returns a list of company career pages.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name,siteUrl or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, createdAt, updatedAt

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Career page id to search for

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Career page name to search for

200.description: An array of career pages

get.description: Returns a list of company departments.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of departments

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the department

200.description: A confirmation of successful update of the department

get.summary: Listing custom fields of a company for job creation
get.description: Returns a list of custom fields of a company.

200.description: An array of custom fields

get.summary: Listing custom-fields of a job template
get.description: Returns a list of custom fields of a job template.

200.description: An array of job template custom fields

get.description: Returns a list of job templates.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=name,id,createdAt or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, type, roleId, roleName, departmentId, departmentName,
         branchId, branchName

200.description: An array of job templates

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the job

get.description: Returns a list of jobs.

parameters.name: vacancyCode
parameters.description: Vacancy code of the job to filter

parameters.name: addressState
parameters.description: Address State of the job to filter

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=name,id,code or fields=all).\
Default: id, code, name, type, publicationType, status, numVacancies,
roleId, roleName, departmentId, departmentName

200.description: An array of jobs

get.summary: Listing custom fields of a job
get.description: Returns a list of custom fields of a job.

200.description: An array of job custom fields

get.description: Returns a list of job steps ordered by step order.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, type, endDate, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of job steps
A confirmation of successful update of the job
A confirmation of successful deletion of the job

get.description: Returns a list of job roles.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of roles

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the role

200.description: A confirmation of successful update of the role

get.description: Returns a list of user access profiles.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, permissions, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of access profiles
The created user

get.description: Returns a list of company users.

parameters.name: profileTestEnabled
parameters.description: Profile test enabling to search for

parameters.name: testStatus
parameters.description: External profile test status to search for

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of departments
The updated user
A confirmation of successful deletion of the user

get.description: Returns the application's rating criteria, grouped by job criteria.

200.description: An array of the application's rating criteria, grouped by job criteria.

delete.description:
Deletes an application tag.
Deprecated, use deletion by tag value instead
Will be removed in api version 2

200.description: A confirmation of successful deletion of the vacancy

post.summary: Creating a comment in candidate timeline
post.description: Creates a comment in the candidate timeline, visible to company users.

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the comment

get.description: Returns the list of comments in candidate timeline.

200.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the comment

post.summary: Creating and sending an email message to a candidate
post.description: Creates and sends an email message based on a template to a candidate.

201.description: A confirmation of successfull creation of the message
A confirmation of successful insertion of the branch

get.description: Returns a list of company branches.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, code, name, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of branches
A confirmation of successful deletion of the branch
A confirmation of successful update of the branch

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the dismissal

get.description: Returns a list of dismissals of a company.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,applicationId or fields=all).\
Default: id, applicationId, date, reason, isRehired, rehiringReason, createdAt, updatedAt

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Application id from the dismissal to filter

200.description: An array of dismissals
A confirmation of successful update of the dismissal

get.description: Returns a list of e-mail templates.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,name or fields=all).\
Default: id, name, subject, body, type, public, userId, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of e-mail templates

post.summary: Create a list of company employees
post.description: Create a list of company employees for internal recruitment

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the company employees list

get.summary: Get a list of company employees
get.description: Get a list of company employees for internal recruitment

200.description: A confirmation of successful get of the company employees list
A confirmation of successful deletion of the company employee

put.description: Update company employee for internal recruitment

200.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the company employees list
A confirmation of successful closed jobs

post.description: Create a classifier will evaluate the candidates

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the classifier

get.description: Return a list of job classifiers

200.description: An array of job classifiers

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the performance evaluation

get.description: Returns a list of performance evaluations of a company.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,applicationId or fields=all).\
Default: id, applicationId, date, value, createdAt, updatedAt

parameters.name: applicationId
parameters.description: Application id from the performance evaluations to filter

200.description: An array of performance evaluations
A confirmation of successful update of the performance evaluation.

post.description: Invites by e-mail an user to the Gupy platform.

201.description: A confirmation of successful invitation of the user

post.description: Creates a vacancy, with code and status.

201.description: A confirmation of successful insertion of the vacancy

get.description: Returns a list of job vacancies.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,code or fields=all).\
Default: id, code, status, errorMessage, createdAt, updatedAt

200.description: An array of vacancies
A confirmation of successful deletion of the vacancy

put.description:
Updates vacancy code, status and errorMessage.

An errorMessage must be provided when updating status to error, otherwise it
must be null.

201.description: A confirmation of successful update of the vacancy
A confirmation of successful configuration of the webhook

get.description: Returns a list of webhooks.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Specify fields to return (eg. fields=id,action or fields=all).\
Default: id, action, postbackUrl

200.description: An array of webhooks
A confirmation of successful deletion of the webhook configuration
A confirmation of successful update of the webhook configuration

isCompanyEmployee.description: The candidate is a company employee

registrationComplete.description: The registration step of application is complete

referredBy.description: Name of the person who referred this candidate

feedbackSent.description: A feedback was sent to the candidate

matching.description: Candidate matching on the company's culture

disapprovalReasonNotes.description: Disapproval reason note for reproved candidates when reason is other

endedAt.description: Date of disqualification if status is reproved, date of withdrawal if status is give_up or date of hiring if status is hired

partnerName.description: Name of the partner who created the application

tags.description: Array of tag names added to the candidate application

candidateId.description: The id of the candidate to be added. This field cannot be used at same time of manualCandidate.

manualCandidate.description: Candidate information. Use when the candidate is not applied yet for any other job. This field cannot be used at same time of candidateId.

mobileNumber.description: Mobile phone number of the candidate (eg. +5511912345678)

items.description: Array of tag names added to the candidate application

score.description: Score value of the application (null if not calculated yet)

mobileNumber.description: Mobile phone number of the candidate (eg. +5511912345678)
Mobile phone number of the candidate (eg. +5511912345678)
Mobile phone number of the candidate (eg. +5511912345678)

areasOfInterest.description: A list of areas of interest

status.description: Current status of the academic qualification

endMonth.description: End month, null if current job

endYear.description: End year, null if current job

from.description: E-mail of the company user. Defaults to company's e-mail address

allowReply.description: The candidate is allowed to reply the message

hidden.description: Comment is hidden (visible only to API or user who created)

answer.description: Answer(s) given by candidate for question

rating.description: Application criteria rating by the user

criteriaRatingsArray.description: An array of the application's rating criteria, grouped by job criteria.

jobVacancyCodeId.description: Job vacancy code id that is been fulfilled by this hiring

jobBoardsName.description: Name to be used on job boards published jobs

companySection.description: Information about the company section of the career page

title.description: Section title shown in the page

description.description: Section description shown in the page

jobsSection.description: Information about the jobs section of the career page

title.description: Section title shown in the page

description.description: Section description shown in the page

socialMediaSection.description: Information about the contacts section of the career page

title.description: Section title shown in the page

facebookUrl.description: URL of the company's Facebook page

instagramUrl.description: URL of the company's Instagram profile

linkedinUrl.description: URL of the company's LinkedIn page

lovemondaysUrl.description: URL of the company's LoveMonday profile

videosSection.description: Information about the videos section of the career page

title.description: Section title shown in the page

description.description: Section description shown in the page

candidateTestimonialsSection.description: Information about the candidates testimonials section of the career page

title.description: Section title shown in the page

description.description: Section description shown in the page

employeeTestimonialsSection.description: Information about the employees testimonials section of the career page

title.description: Section title shown in the page

description.description: Section description shown in the page

order.description: Custom field order of appearance when editing a job

required.description: Informs if this custom field response is mandatory

enum.description: Possible options to be provided as value

jobTemplateCustomFields.description: An array of job template custom field

remoteWorking.description: This job is for remote working.

customFields.description: Custom fields defined for this job template

order.description: Custom field order of appearance when editing a job template

required.description: Informs if this custom field response is mandatory

enum.description: Possible options to be provided as value

jobCustomFields.description: An array of job custom field

remoteWorking.description: This job is for remote working.

errorMessage.description: Error message when status=error (eg. Gestor invlido)

managerId.description: User ID of the job manager

recruiterId.description: User ID of the job recruiter

customFields.description: Custom fields defined for this job

jobRatingCriterias.description: Rating criterias that belongs to the job

cancelReasonNotes.description: Job cancel reason notes provided by user when cancelReason is other

canceledByEmail.description: E-mail of the person who canceled the job

creatorId.description: User ID of the job creator

videoUrl.description: A video url about the job.

approvers.description: User ids to be approvers of the job

code.description: Company's job internal code. If not provided, the API will generate one.

status.description: Job status. Refer to https://developers.gupy.io/docs/mudanas-de-estado-de-uma-vaga (portuguese only) for more information on updating the status of a job.

numVacancies.description: The number of open vacancies for this job

description.description: Job description, shown in the career page (free text)

responsibilities.description: Responsibilities of the job, shown in the career page (free text)

prerequisites.description: Pre-requisites of the job, shown in the career page (free text)

additionalInformation.description: Additional information of the job, shown in the career page (free text)

disabilities.description: This job is available to person with disabilities

remoteWorking.description: This job is for remote working.

salary.description: Job salary information (not shown in the career page).

recruiterEmail.description: Job recruiter e-mail. If provided, must be an valid user in Gupy.

managerEmail.description: Job manager e-mail. If provided, must be an valid user in Gupy.

careerPageId.description: Id of the career page where the job will be shown.

customFields.description: Custom fields values defined for this job.

cancelReasonNotes.description: Job cancel reason notes provided by user when cancelReason is other

canceledByEmail.description: E-mail of the person who canceled the job

videoUrl.description: A video url about the job.

approvers.description: User ids to be approvers of the job

templateId.description: Job template to be used when creating the job. If provided, the template will be copied first.

code.description: Company's job internal code. If not provided, the API will generate one.

numVacancies.description: The number of open vacancies for this job

description.description: Job description, shown in the career page (free text)

responsibilities.description: Responsibilities of the job, shown in the career page (free text)

prerequisites.description: Pre-requisites of the job, shown in the career page (free text)

additionalInformation.description: Additional information of the job, shown in the career page (free text)

disabilities.description: This job is available to person with disabilities

addressLatitude.description: Work location latitude. If not provided, the addressZipCode will be used to get the latitude (this functionality only works with Brazilian postal codes).

addressLongitude.description: Work location longitude. If not provided, the addressZipCode will be used to get the longitude (this functionality only works with Brazilian postal codes).

remoteWorking.description: This job is for remote working.

salary.description: Job salary information (not shown in the career page).

recruiterEmail.description: Job recruiter e-mail. If provided, must be an valid user in Gupy.

managerEmail.description: Job manager e-mail. If provided, must be an valid user in Gupy.

careerPageId.description: Id of the career page where the job will be shown.

customFields.description: Custom fields values defined for this job.

videoUrl.description: A video url about the job.

order.description: Custom field order of appearance when editing a job

required.description: Informs if this custom field response is mandatory

enum.description: Possible options to be provided as value

jobCustomFieldData.description: Custom field data for job creation or update

oneOf.description: Custom field selected options which must be available in enum of `jobCustomFields`

roleRequest.description: Role to be created or updated

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

status.description: The HTTP status code generated for this occurrence of the problem

paginatedUserAccessProfile.description: An array of user access profiles

profileTestEnabled.description: Flag to set if tests are enabled

accessProfileId.description: Id from access profile to be bound

departmentId.description: Id from department to be bound

branchIds.description: Ids from branches to be bound

departmentId.description: Id from department from whose the user belongs

roleId.description: Id from role from whose the user belongs

profileTestEnabled.description: Checks if user must make profile tests

branchIds.description: List of company branches IDs associated to the user

hidden.description: Comment is hidden (visible only to API)

path.description: The path in the organizational structure
The path in the organizational structure

isRehired.description: If the employee will be rehired
If the employee will be rehired
If the employee will be rehired

errorMessage.description: Error message when status=error (eg. Gestor invlido)
Error message when status=error (eg. Gestor invlido)

postbackUrl.description: Url to be called when webhook is fired

clientHeaders.description: Headers to be included on the request ({ "myCustomHeader": "myExpectedValue "})

postbackUrl.description: Url to be called when webhook is fired

clientHeaders.description: Headers to be included on the request ({ "myCustomHeader": "myExpectedValue "})

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: The number of requests left for the time window.

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: The UTC timestamp at which the current rate limit window resets

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

status.description: The HTTP status code generated for this occurrence of the problem

TooManyRequests.description: The number of allowed requests in a given time window has exceeded the allowed limit, try again after X-RateLimit-Reset unix timestamp

schema.example: Too many requests, please try again later.
